Subject: [Feature Request] Require alerts whenever an admin or privilege user perform any changes/modification to the DLP policy
Description:
Current ticket is a copy of a case created on 12-Jul-2022 and that didn't get migrated to Netwrix Support Portal.

Initial description: 
Currently there is no alert generated by the system when a DLP policy is modified by the administrator or privilege user. 
Ideally there should be an alert for each of the privilege action performed by the admin or super user along with additional details such as which policy was edited, timestamp, what has been changed, etc.
What_We_Know__c: The customer would like an alert for each of the privilege action performed by the admin or super user along with additional details such as which policy was edited, timestamp, what has been changed, etc.
Next_Steps__c: This request was included on EPP Unify roadmap
